model.components

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.components.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Board.Position
      Class that represents a connection between an x and an y integer so it can be used in an 2 dimensional playfield.
      static class  Board.Row
      Class Row that holds a set of blocks that represent a row on the board.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int xHigh
      For each bound a integer that indicates the size of the current field.

      For each bound a integer that indicates the size of the current field.
      int yHigh
      For each bound a integer that indicates the size of the current field.
      int yLow
      For each bound a integer that indicates the size of the current field.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Constructs a Board and initializes the openPositions List and the filledPositions map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connectedToFilledPositions(java.util.List<Board.Position> positions)
      Check if a given list of positions are connected to the Board by creating an empty list and passing it to checkNextPosition.
      boolean fill(Board.Position p, Block b)
      Fills the given position with the given Block.
      java.util.List<Board.Row> getCreatingRows(Play m, Board.Row.Orientation or)
      Creates a List of Row objects that represent all the individual rows that will be expanded or created by executing PlayBlocksMove m.
      java.util.Map<Board.Position,Block> getFilledPositions()
      getFilledPositions will give the list of filled positions by a block
      java.util.List<Board.Position> getOpenPositions()
      returns a list of the open Positions on the board
      java.util.List<Board.Position> getOpenPositionsCopy()
      returns a copy of the openpositions such that an other class can use the list without modifying the board.
      boolean isPerfectSquare()
      Checks if the board is a PerfectSquare which would mean that the game got stuck and must be ended.
      void openPositionIn(Board.Position p, java.util.List<Board.Position> pos)
      The position that will be opened.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Constructs a Board and initializes the openPositions List and the filledPositions map. It also opens the starting point of the Board

    • Method Detail

      • fill

        public boolean fill(Board.Position p,
                    Block b)
        Fills the given position with the given Block. Also opens up new positions according to the given position.
        Parameters:
        p - the position where the block will be put
        b - the Block that will be added to the Board
        Returns:
        true if the position is filled with the block
        Throws:
        FirstPositionNotOriginException - if the first move of the game is not placed in position 0,0

      • openPositionIn

        public void openPositionIn(Board.Position p,
                           java.util.List<Board.Position> pos)
        The position that will be opened. Opening can happen in board's openPositions list or in an external list.
        Parameters:
        p - the Position that will be opened
        pos - the list in which the position will be opened

      • connectedToFilledPositions

        public boolean connectedToFilledPositions(java.util.List<Board.Position> positions)
        Check if a given list of positions are connected to the Board by creating an empty list and passing it to checkNextPosition.
        Parameters:
        positions - the list with the positions that will be checked
        Returns:
        whether the positions are connected to the main board or not

      • getCreatingRows

        public java.util.List<Board.Row> getCreatingRows(Play m,
                                                 Board.Row.Orientation or)
        Creates a List of Row objects that represent all the individual rows that will be expanded or created by executing PlayBlocksMove m.
        Parameters:
        m - the move that will create the rows
        ro - the orientation in which the PlayBlockMove blocks are oriented
        Returns:
        A List of Rows that the move will create or expand

      • isPerfectSquare

        public boolean isPerfectSquare()
        Checks if the board is a PerfectSquare which would mean that the game got stuck and must be ended.
        Returns:
        if the field is a perfectSquare

      • getOpenPositions

        public java.util.List<Board.Position> getOpenPositions()
        returns a list of the open Positions on the board
        Returns:
        openPositions

      • getOpenPositionsCopy

        public java.util.List<Board.Position> getOpenPositionsCopy()
        returns a copy of the openpositions such that an other class can use the list without modifying the board.
        Returns:

      • getFilledPositions

        public java.util.Map<Board.Position,Block> getFilledPositions()
        getFilledPositions will give the list of filled positions by a block
        Returns:
        filledPositions
